level.text: No person shall participate in providing LCS services in the District unless such person is in compliance with all applicable provisions of this chapter, all other applicable provisions of this title, and other applicable laws.
No operator shall provide limousine service except as provided in this chapter.
Beginning November 1, 2013, no operator shall provide sedan service except as provided in this chapter and in Chapter 14 (Operation of Sedans) of this title.
Beginning November 1, 2013, no LCS organization or base owner shall knowingly permit the use of its LCS vehicle in violation of this chapter or Chapter 14 of this title.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 2812, 2828 (May 20, 1994); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 12394 (August 30, 2013).
